title: Bug 2529 [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529 [Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: The Open and Close project options are not consistently available.
EB: Either both the Open and Close project options should always be available or neither of them should be enabled.
SR:
1. Open the project menu. 
2. Select both P1 and P2 from the menu. 
3. Observe the availability of the Open and Close project options.
